General.Name: Dalian Huarui Heavy Industry Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Dalian Huarui Heavy Industry Group Co., Ltd. manufactures, sells, and services technical equipment primarily in China. The company offers bulk material handling, port, coke oven, metallurgic, and lifting machineries; bridge and gantry cranes; cranes for metallurgical plants; laminar spray welded rollers and galvanized sink rollers, as well as furnace rollers for cold rolling mills; wind turbines components; high-end castings; and ship crankshafts. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1914 and is headquartered in Dalian, China.
